definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (= (sacred) circle of stones; cf. Di on Jos 5:9, where word-play on roll away, off)—c. art. exc. Jos 5:9, Jos 12:23; —

place E. of Jericho, where Isr. lay encamped Jos 4:19, Jos 4:20, Jos 5:9, Jos 5:10, Jos 9:6, Jos 10:7, Jos 10:9, Jos 14:6 cf. also Mic 6:5 & Ju Jdg 3:19 [[הַפְּסִילִים]] ´[[אֲשֶׁר אֶת־הַגּ]];? mod. Tell Jeljul Bd:Pal 169; perh. also the place where sacrifices were offered 1Sa 10:8, 1Sa 11:14, 1Sa 11:15, 1Sa 11:15, 1Sa 13:4, 1Sa 13:7, 1Sa 13:8, 1Sa 13:12, 1Sa 13:15 (in v:1Sa 13:15 ins. also c. other words, Dr cf. We) 1Sa 15:12, 1Sa 15:21, 1Sa 15:33; place of illicit sacrifice Ho 4:15, Ho 9:15, Ho 12:12, Am 4:4, Am 5:5, Am 5:5, named also Ju Jdg 2:1, 1Sa 7:16, 2Sa 19:16, 2Sa 19:41; ? = [[בֵּית הַגִּלְגׇּל]] Ne 12:29.
place on border between Judah & Benjamin Jos 15:17 (= [[גְּלִילוֹת]] Jos 18:17 cf. Di).
place in N. Isr., dwelling of prophets 2Ki 2:1, 2Ki 4:38, mod. Jiljilie S. from Nâbulus, SW. from Seilûn (Shiloh) cf. Di Ri:HWB 518.
place in N. Isr. near Mt. Gerizim and Mt. Ebal De 11:30, identif. with
by Ke Ri:HWB 518 Schenkel:BL SS; but cf. Di.

in phr. [[מֶלֶךְ גּוֹיִם לְגִּלְגׇּל]] Jos 12:23, in list of Canaanitish kings; prob. name of a (northern) district cf. Di (B basile/a Geei\ th=v Galilai/av—but LXXL & Codd. Goeim th=v Gelgel); Di comp. Is 8:23.
